answers.answer: I guess I should  add that im 23 years old and im 127 pounds and I took this test at like 12:30 at night im not sure if that will mke a difference but just thought I should add
I also have symptoms such as fatigue , weakness , dizzy spells that don't last very long like maybe  second or two , leg twitching , and tingling sensation on scalp , face and upper arms
I JUST CHECKED IT AGIN THIS MORNING ITS BEEN SEVERAL HOURS AFTER SENCE IVE EAT ANYTHING AND NOW ITS SAYING 132

Hi!Well, any reading above 180 is not good, but since it is just above 180 its not bad either. Also, a fasting blood sugar of 132 is high. Just a single day’s reading of 24 hours is not enough to diagnose a condition as it may be related to something you ate. You may be pre-diabetes or early diabetes. It is important to get a fasting blood sugar, PP blood sugar (two hours after meals), and Hb1Ac (to know your sugar control of last 3 months).Please consult your PCP for primary examination. Take care!The medical advice given should not be considered a substitute for medical care provided by a doctor who can examine you. The advice may not be completely correct for you as the doctor cannot examine you and does not know your complete medical history. Hence this reply to your post should only be considered as a guiding line and you must consult your doctor at the earliest for your medical problem.

question: I took a blood test over at my friends house on his little diabetes blood monitor and it said 183  6-2 what does that mean is that good or bad
